General.Name: Quipt Home Medical Corp
General.Description: Quipt Home Medical Corp., through its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of durable and home medical equipment and supplies in the United States. The company offers nebulizers; invasive ventilation; and home medical equipment, such as stair lifts, ramps, bath safety equipment, daily living, and ambulatory, as well as home modification solutions. It also engages in the rental and sale of medical equipment and related devices. In addition, the company offers solutions that supports patients dealing with heart and pulmonary disease, sleep apnea, reduced mobility, COPD, neuromuscular disorders, obesity, and other chronic health conditions. The company was formerly known as Protech Home Medical Corp. and changed its name to Quipt Home Medical Corp. in May 2021. Quipt Home Medical Corp. is headquartered in Wilder, Kentucky.
General.Address: 1019 Town Drive, Wilder, KY, United States, 41076
